tagRef.name: Inside Cluster Sound
tagRef.tooltip: play only when player is inside cluster.

bit.name: Transparent Should Output Depth For DOF
Do Not Include In Static Lightmap
Do Not Include In PVS Generation
Mesh Has Per-Instance Lighting (Do Not Modify)

plugin.comment: These pointers go to a dataref (x14 bytes) elsewhere in memory which contains the given buffer. A table in the tag header contains pointers to these pointers.

uint64.name: Runtime Code Pointer
uint64.tooltip: becomes a pointer in memory at runtime. don't poke me

uint64.name: User Data
uint64.tooltip: The offset from the start of the block to the start of this shape (index * block element size). This becomes a pointer to this shape in memory at runtime. don't poke me

uint64.name: Runtime MOPP Code Pointer
uint64.tooltip: becomes a pointer to the start of the MOPP code data in memory at runtime. don't poke me
